title: Cheryl spotted in Strictly Come Dancing audience as week five kicks off
text:
Did you catch Cheryl on Strictly? (Picture: BBC)

Strictly Come Dancing was given an extra dose of celebrity as week five kicked off, after Cheryl was spotted in the audience.

As hosts Claudia Winkleman and Tess Daly descended down the studio stairs, the camera cut to the audience where Cheryl was seen clapping along.

Celebrities often turn up in the Strictly audience, like Mary Berry, although this is the first time Cheryl has made an appearance on the show.

The 36-year-old singer might be there to support The Greatest Dancer co-judge and professional dancer Oti Mabuse, after their stint together on the BBC show earlier this year.

Spot the Cheryl (Picture: BBC One)

This year, Oti Mabuse is paired up with Emmerdale star Kelvin Fletcher who has become one of the hot favourites after sending the judges wild last week.

Cheryl’s presence didn’t go unnoticed by viewers either.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Earlier in the series, RuPaul made a special cameo in support of Drag Race co-judge Michelle Visage.

Strictly Come Dancing continues Sunday on BBC One.

description: Did you catch Cheryl on Strictly Come Dancing?
